markdown:
{{NPC infobox |game = poe2 |name = Ganor |image = Portrait_Caral_Convo.png |image2 = PE2 Ganor.png |caption = |race = Godlike |subrace = Moon |gender = Male |culture = [Deadfire Archipelago](/deadfireArchipelago/) |background = |faction = |deity = Berath |personality = |class = Priest |level = 5 |MIG = 10 |CON = 10 |DEX = 12 |PER = 11 |INT = 10 |RES = 10 |health = 80 |damage = 5-8 {{crush}} / 5-8 {{crush}} |accuracy = 33 / 33 |penetration = 7 / 7 |deflection = 32 |fortitude = 32 |reflex = 38 |will = 37 |dr = 3 |ability = [Silver Tide](/silverTideDeadfire/), [Holy Radiance](/holyRadianceDeadfire/), [Restore](/restore/), [Suppress Affliction](/suppressAfflictionDeadfire/), [Touch of Rot](/touchOfRotPriestOfBerath/), [Holy Meditation](/holyMeditationDeadfire/), [Iconic Projection](/iconicProjectionDeadfire/), [Withdraw](/withdrawDeadfire/), [Consecrated Ground](/consecratedGroundDeadfire/), [Spreading Plague](/spreadingPlaguePriestOfBerath/) |location = [Luminous Bathhouse](/luminousBathhouse/) |quests = [Dirty Laundry](/dirtyLaundry/)
[Refined Arrangement](/refinedArrangement/) |sells = Rooms |resting = yes |companion = |loot = |body = Kuaru Clothing |ring1 = Ring of Overseeing (Deadfire){{!}}Ring of Overseeing |internalname = CHA_05_AD_Ganor |guid = 97d8fef9-10a2-4e2c-8d2e-2527afef3336 }} '''Ganor''' is a character in {{poe2}}. ## Background {{Description|You are greeted by a tall, carefully composed man. The crescent moon in the center is his forehead glows faintly. Up close, the careful tailoring of his opal-adorned robes and their immaculate cleanliness speak to a deep well of vanity.}} Ganor is the proprietor and owner of the Luminous Bathhouse and a walking advertisement for the kind of pampering and opulence to be found within its halls. ## Interactions {{Interactions |companion = |wares = Offers [rooms](/luminousBathhouse/) at the bathhouse. |stronghold = |rest = |quests_started = |quests_involved = * [Dirty Laundry](/dirtyLaundry/) * [Refined Arrangement](/refinedArrangement/) |none = |other = * A Watcher with the [Barbarian](/barbarian/) class, or the [Raider](/raider/), [Dissident](/dissident/), or [Laborer](/laborer/) background will have unique introductory dialogue when first speaking with Ganor: :''"My guards will not hesitate to expel any rowdy or obnoxious individuals. Mind your manners, and you will find no quarrel with me."'' * A [fire godlike](/fireGodlike/) Watcher also has unique introductory dialogue: :''"You are the first of Magran's children to visit my establishment." He stares for a moment at your flaming head, pursing his lips.'' :''"Mind where you stand lest you set the linens aflame. They will cost you a pretty copper to replace."'' }} ## =Rooms = * Moistened Cove ({{cp2|200}}): +1 Constitution, +25% healing received * The Bathyal Drop ({{cp2|400}}): +2 health restored each 6 sec, +1 max Power pool * The Abyss ({{cp2|800}}): +25% beneficial effect duration, +10% area of effect ## =Quests = * [Dirty Laundry](/dirtyLaundry/): If asked, he points you in the direction of [Brizze](/brizze/), the new bathhouse attendant. * [Refined Arrangement](/refinedArrangement/) ([cut content](/categoryCutContent/)): Ganor is concerned that the rising prices of refined luminous adra may force him to close the bathhouse, and asks for your assistance. [Category:Periki's Overlook characters](/categoryPerikisOverlookCharacters/) [Category:Luminous Bathhouse characters](/categoryLuminousBathhouseCharacters/)

{{NPC infobox |game = poe2 |name = Ganor |image = Portrait_Caral_Convo.png |image2 = PE2 Ganor.png |caption = |race = Godlike |subrace = Moon |gender = Male |culture = [[Deadfire Archipelago]] |background = |faction = |deity = Berath |personality = |class = Priest |level = 5 |MIG = 10 |CON = 10 |DEX = 12 |PER = 11 |INT = 10 |RES = 10 |health = 80 |damage = 5-8 {{crush}} / 5-8 {{crush}} |accuracy = 33 / 33 |penetration = 7 / 7 |deflection = 32 |fortitude = 32 |reflex = 38 |will = 37 |dr = 3 |ability = [[Silver Tide (Deadfire)|Silver Tide]], [[Holy Radiance (Deadfire)|Holy Radiance]], [[Restore]], [[Suppress Affliction (Deadfire)|Suppress Affliction]], [[Touch of Rot (Priest of Berath)|Touch of Rot]], [[Holy Meditation (Deadfire)|Holy Meditation]], [[Iconic Projection (Deadfire)|Iconic Projection]], [[Withdraw (Deadfire)|Withdraw]], [[Consecrated Ground (Deadfire)|Consecrated Ground]], [[Spreading Plague (Priest of Berath)|Spreading Plague]] |location = [[Luminous Bathhouse]] |quests = [[Dirty Laundry]]
[[Refined Arrangement]] |sells = Rooms |resting = yes |companion = |loot = |body = Kuaru Clothing |ring1 = Ring of Overseeing (Deadfire){{!}}Ring of Overseeing |internalname = CHA_05_AD_Ganor |guid = 97d8fef9-10a2-4e2c-8d2e-2527afef3336 }} '''Ganor''' is a character in {{poe2}}. ==Background== {{Description|You are greeted by a tall, carefully composed man. The crescent moon in the center is his forehead glows faintly. Up close, the careful tailoring of his opal-adorned robes and their immaculate cleanliness speak to a deep well of vanity.}} Ganor is the proprietor and owner of the Luminous Bathhouse and a walking advertisement for the kind of pampering and opulence to be found within its halls. ==Interactions== {{Interactions |companion = |wares = Offers [[Luminous Bathhouse|rooms]] at the bathhouse. |stronghold = |rest = |quests_started = |quests_involved = * [[Dirty Laundry]] * [[Refined Arrangement]] |none = |other = * A Watcher with the [[Barbarian]] class, or the [[Raider]], [[Dissident]], or [[Laborer]] background will have unique introductory dialogue when first speaking with Ganor: :''"My guards will not hesitate to expel any rowdy or obnoxious individuals. Mind your manners, and you will find no quarrel with me."'' * A [[fire godlike]] Watcher also has unique introductory dialogue: :''"You are the first of Magran's children to visit my establishment." He stares for a moment at your flaming head, pursing his lips.'' :''"Mind where you stand lest you set the linens aflame. They will cost you a pretty copper to replace."'' }} ===Rooms=== * Moistened Cove ({{cp2|200}}): +1 Constitution, +25% healing received * The Bathyal Drop ({{cp2|400}}): +2 health restored each 6 sec, +1 max Power pool * The Abyss ({{cp2|800}}): +25% beneficial effect duration, +10% area of effect ===Quests=== * [[Dirty Laundry]]: If asked, he points you in the direction of [[Brizze]], the new bathhouse attendant. * [[Refined Arrangement]] ([[:Category:Cut content|cut content]]): Ganor is concerned that the rising prices of refined luminous adra may force him to close the bathhouse, and asks for your assistance. [[Category:Periki's Overlook characters]] [[Category:Luminous Bathhouse characters]]
title: Ganor
